title: WebMaster and Graphic Designer
descriptions: Managed the regular updating of web content using Drupal and executed SEO strategies to drive website traffic
Led the revitalization of digital graphics to create a more intuitive navigation structure, resulting in a 10% increase in student attendance
Generated over 100+ marketing materials, including flyers, badges, presentations, and advertisements showcasing the latest design trends

title: Lead Student Assistant
descriptions: Led training sessions every semester to ensure all staff members were informed about their scope of work and responsibilities
Supervised three departments, providing full administrative support to coordinators, faculty and staff
Supported 70+ students per day with any general questions by referring them to appropriate university resources and troubleshoot computer problems brought by staff
